msg: Branch the 3.1.x code for 3.1.0 release and maintenance releases

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2052, CAMEL-2054: Minor overhaul of TransactionErrorHandler simplyfing internal logic. Added better support for using multiple transactions with different propagation behavior. Added markRollbackOnlyLast() to rollback only last TX and not the outer TXs.
